Sentencas: In this study, a modified sol-gel method was employed to synthesize Gd and W co-doped La2Mo2O9 (LMX).
Titulo: Structural and electrical properties of Gd and W co-doped La2Mo2O9 as electrolyte for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: The impact of Gd and W co-doping on the pristine LMX lattice was examined using X-Ray diffraction, and the local structural parameters were analyzed through Rietveld refinement.
Titulo: Structural and electrical properties of Gd and W co-doped La2Mo2O9 as electrolyte for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: The findings indicate that both the pure and co-doped LMX samples possess a cubic structure with a P2(1)3 space group.
Titulo: Structural and electrical properties of Gd and W co-doped La2Mo2O9 as electrolyte for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: To investigate the electrical performance of the lanthanum molybdate (La2Mo2O9) both in its pure form and when co-doped with Gd and W, electrochemical impedance spectroscopy was conducted.
Titulo: Structural and electrical properties of Gd and W co-doped La2Mo2O9 as electrolyte for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: The results demonstrated that co-doping enhances the conductivity of oxy-ions compared to pure LMX.
Titulo: Structural and electrical properties of Gd and W co-doped La2Mo2O9 as electrolyte for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: Specifically, La1.7Gd0.3Mo1.7W0.3O9 (LMXG3) exhibited a higher ionic conductivity of approximately 2 x 10(-2) Scm(-1) at a temperature of 650 degrees C, surpassing the conductivity of the pure LMX sample and other co-doped LMX samples.
Titulo: Structural and electrical properties of Gd and W co-doped La2Mo2O9 as electrolyte for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: This investigation highlights the potential of the Gd and W co-doped LMX system as a solid electrolyte for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs).
Titulo: Structural and electrical properties of Gd and W co-doped La2Mo2O9 as electrolyte for IT-SOFCs
